description: This annual report summarizes impacts from the Initiative to Reduce Avoidable Hospitalizations among Nursing Facility Residents in 2014. This initiative is designed to test ways to reduce avoidable hospitalizations among long-stay nursing facility residents. For such individuals, avoidable hospitalizations can be dangerous, disruptive, and disorienting. The results in this report are based on experience during the second performance year of the initiative, calendar year 2014.
title: Nursing Facility Initiative Annual Report
